thread.title: Russia boosts air strikes against Assad foes in Syria PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: Russia boosts air strikes against Assad foes in Syria | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Russia boosts air strikes against Assad foes in Syria PBS NewsHour
text: In Syria, Russian forces stepped up attacks on opponents of Syrian President Bashar al-Assad, bombing more than 50 targets over the past day. Sam Dagher, a reporter for The Wall Street Journal, joins Hari Sreenivasan via Skype from Beirut, to discuss the situation.
